175753056738–2gfb1ucgrp7omp4aa2kikfjsg8fb9gaj.apps.googleusercontent.com
Hello blank fragment
How do I create a user account?
To create a user account, go to the Sign Up page, fill in your details including name, email, and password, and click Submit. You\'ll receive an email to verify your account.
How do I log in to the app?
Enter your registered email and password on the Login screen. If you\'ve forgotten your password, click on \"Forgot Password\" to reset it.
What should I do if I forget my password?
If you forget your password, click on \"Forgot Password\" at the login page, and follow the instructions to reset it using your email.
How do I rent a waste truck service?
To rent a waste truck, go to the Services section, select \'Rent a Waste Truck,\' choose the desired date and location, and confirm your booking.
How do I schedule garbage pickup?
Go to the Garbage Schedule section, select your area, and view or schedule a pickup. You can also set reminders for upcoming collection dates.
How do I report a waste management issue?
To report an issue, go to the \'Report Issues\' section, fill in the details of the issue including location and description, attach any relevant images, and submit the report.
How can I contact customer support?
You can contact customer support through the app by navigating to the Support section, where you can chat with support representatives or send an email.
Can I chat with waste service companies?
Yes, you can chat with service providers via the app by going to the \'My Services\' section and selecting the company you\'ve rented services from.
What is the purpose of this app?
This app is designed to simplify waste management by allowing users to schedule garbage pickups, report issues, rent waste management services, and interact with waste service providers.
Is there a way to track my waste pickups?
Yes, you can track your waste pickups in the \'Garbage Schedule\' section. Here, you can see upcoming scheduled pickups and their status.
Can I see ongoing reports from other users?
Yes, go to the \'Community\' section where you can view public reports and posts shared by other users regarding waste management issues in your area.
How can I update my account information?
To update your account information, navigate to the Profile section in the app, where you can edit details like your email, phone number, and address.
